entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @Amy_Siskind I think he's tested positive. Like I said before, they would never admit if Trump or Pence died from the Coronavirus. They would shoot them in the head in the WH and claim that Obama and Hillary snuck in and assassinated them! Would anyone put this past this Administration?
